overview: Elliott is hunted by Curtis who has spent six years behind bars because of his testimony. After knocking out several baddies and putting up with the zany antics of his sidekick Taylor, Elliott guns down his antagonist, but Luana Walters, the girl he almost marries, will not abide a gunslinger so Elliott is compelled to ride off alone into the sunset once more.
tagline: IN THE HIGH SIERRAS Life Is Cheap...and Law A Laughing Stock...But "WILD BILL HICKOK"...Is Aimin' To Take A Hand On The Side Of Law An' Order!
title: Across the Sierras
